discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
   * @deprecated as of Turborepo 2.0.0. Consider using {@link RootSchema.globalDependencies} instead.
```

In addition to using `@deprecated`, you can use the `@link` tag to point to the new value to use, directly, which means people can just click it to be taken to that field:

![Screenshot_20240814_233705](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/804aa6e6-faef-4994-bb40-0b8df3abec45)

```suggestion
   * @deprecated as of Turborepo 2.0.0. Consider using {@link Pipeline.inputs} instead.
```

In addition to using @deprecated, you can use the @link tag to point to the new value to use, directly, which means people can just click it to be taken to that field:

![Screenshot_20240814_233841](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b3487201-066a-436b-bd45-afbb978c39b0)
